thread.title: 2 Travelers

author: 2 Travelers
title: 2 Travelers
text: Public Storage has been taking and taking more and more "comforts" away from customers. First they took away the bathrooms located on each floor (finally those were opened back up), then they took away the lighting inside each locker, and of course there is the general run-down look that the facility has taken on since Public Storage purchased. And we can't forget that the rental fees keep rising each year. So we pay more for less. I would be happy to speak with a representative to air my concerns if you are interested.
